sys — System-specific parameters and functions¶

class drama.Drama(text_file)¶

Drama class make diffrent xml dom functions and actions on the tei data availble.

get_stage_all()¶

returns all the taged stages as a collection. it can be used to create corpora needed for the nltk trainer collection has four 5 diffrent keys which can be handeled seprately. this function dosn’t work with segmented stages.
